message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200.  I believe it's a great deal given its features and quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While I understand your budget, I can't go as low as $120. Could you do $170? It's a high-quality product that I'm confident you'd be happy with.
I'm still interested in the product, but $170 is a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $145, but that's as high as I can go. Is there any flexibility on your end?
